topic.title: Reviewers
topic.section:
Reviewers are assigned by the Track Director to review a submission. Reviewers provide recommendations for or against submissions via online review (although some conferences opt for an email review), and can upload reviewed files for the use of the Track Director and the Author.

New users can enroll themselves as a Reviewer on registration to a scheduled conference, and can enroll themselves with other scheduled conferences from their profile page.

For more information, see the {help_topic key="editorial.reviewersRole" text="Reviewer's Role page"}.
